<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Legerdemain Handkerchief](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2194)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Extradimensional" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=67" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 115 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This frilled, silvery-gray handkerchief is a stylish tool for personal hygiene by all appearances, but it can be used to covertly make very small items vanish.

<document level="2" id="action-1693" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
